C0104 - Disallowed name \"foo\".diff:
---

@@ -1 +1,10 @@
-    foo = SimpleImage(front_filename)
+def load_image(front_filename):
+    """
+    Load an image from a file.
+
+    Args:
+        front_filename (str): The name of the image file.
+    Returns:
+        SimpleImage: A loaded image object.
+    """
+    return SimpleImage(front_filename)
